ES: El hotel no es para nada lujoso y se ve que ya tiene tiempo de funcionar. La decoraci√≥n se nota que ha tenido bastante uso.  Las habitaciones son grandes y comodas. Se pueden encontrar varios tipos de restaurantes cerca: a pocos metros est√° Garufa, y una cuadra esta Sierra Madre, en la calle de atras hay comida r√°pida y comida menos formal. Hay mucha √°rea para caminar si se quiere, esta frente a Macroplaza, la Catedral y el museo de arte    EN: The hotel is not luxurious at all and it looks like it has time to run. The decoration shows that it has had enough use.  The rooms are big and comfortable.  The cleanliness of all areas is quite good, it stays well.    Depending on the side of the room you touch you may or may not have a good view.    It is a fairly convenient hotel if you are going to be in the center of town. It is close to Fundidora Park.    The restaurant is comfortable, although I was only there for breakfasts, which offer a quite assorted buffe.    All the staff are very friendly.    You can find several types of restaurants nearby: a few meters away is Garufa, and a block is this Sierra Madre, in the back street there is fast food and less formal food.
